website_summaries.verdict: An adorable children's onesie, this high-quality pajama suit is sure to impress as it transforms your child into a unicorn.
pros: Available in multiple colors and sizes
Customers appreciate the breathable and extra-plush material
cons: A few customers complained that the seams could be higher quality

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy it trust me.
customer_reviews.text: If your kid is messes dont buy this. This is made with cheap material that will wear out fast.
customer_reviews.author: Roxana

customer_reviews.title: Good quality! Too big! Daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 8, her height is 49, we got her the size 6 and it’s still really big, the tail is almost on the back of her knees and the crouch part of the pants is at her knees as well... I put 5 stars because she loves it and won’t take it off since she got it (reason not to return or exchange) I should’ve gotten her maybe a size 5 or even 4... oh well! Quality seems good ;)
customer_reviews.author: Ougm

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These little onesies are super popular at kids sleep over parties these days. The material is better than expected and not like a super flimsy material. The fit was as expected and the color is exactly like it is in the picture- what you see is what you get here to a “T”. Very cool.
customer_reviews.author: Samara Blxck

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and Great Price
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old daughter LOVED the costume. I found it to be of good craftsmanship and very affordable. I think it will work great during an East Coast Halloween! I like that they offer many sizes and styles as well!! Already recommended to our friends!
customer_reviews.author: Tara M. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: unicorn dancing around my house
customer_reviews.text: my daughter loves this unicorn onesie. The hood and tail are sturdy and so cute. The buttons are big enough that as a 5-6 yr old she can do them herself. The pockets are great. We have used this as a swim coverup because why not. It's out year round.
customer_reviews.author: hhollic

customer_reviews.title: Best Grandparent Award
customer_reviews.text: Talk about winning the best Grandparent Award this Christmas and all thanks to this delightful little onesie. Our little granddaughter was in unicorn heaven when she opened this gift. It immediately went on and she promptly told me she was wearing it on the airplane the next day. I loved her joy in this absolutely delicious little onesie. From the horn on the hood to the tail on the backside it was absolutely perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Michelegg

customer_reviews.title: Great buy great quality
customer_reviews.text: They are cute! I bought two and there are absolutely no flaws. I checked reviews first and went ahead and bought them. I thoroughly checked them and they were in perfect condition. They are not too thin or heavy. They are good enough to keep the kids warm but not too hot. I bought it on size big on purpose because of reviews stating they were small. They would have been fine in their regular size. But now they have much room to grow.
customer_reviews.author: Tara scheurn

customer_reviews.title: Poor design!
customer_reviews.text: Not designed to fit well. Fit all over true to size, except the crouch area, it hangs to her knees. Poor design!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Costume unicorn onesie
customer_reviews.text: She loves it so I love it. It’s fleece so soft like a blanket and has pockets. Fits with enough space that she’ll have it for a while. Material doesn’t feel cheap and it’s well sewn.
customer_reviews.author: Gen

customer_reviews.title: It’s just lovely. Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my grand daughter. It’s thick and very warm. Unfortunately the winter turned into summer very fast in Holland but it was a little big so she can wear it next winter. I got some photos from her it is cute and she was very happy
customer_reviews.author: Ann Julie Telford

customer_reviews.title: Adorable but subpar quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in October for a Hanukkah present...was unwrapped for Hanukkah tonight and unfortunately the quality is disappointing. Not only is it missing a button, the leg is torn and has several black marks on it. Unfortunately the return window has passed.
customer_reviews.author: LARA M

customer_reviews.title: Not good as a costume or pajamas
customer_reviews.text: Super cute BUT not a great Halloween costume. The hoodie is so big, it obscures vision and falls too far down the face. My kid refused to wear the hood. The wings are also floppy. It’s fine for pajamas, but good luck having a five year old unbutton it in time to pee in the middle of the night. And who wants to sleep with a hoodie? It’s best worn as a warm Snuggie type thing before bed or early morning.
customer_reviews.author: Reb

customer_reviews.title: She loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it. She said it is very comfortable and cozy.
customer_reviews.author: Vergel Salazar

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a size 7/8 girl
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 6 years old girl but her size is more 7/8. It is still a big large for her but so she can wear it for a longer time. The only thing is that it promotes a discount if you purchase two but it in Amazon there is no such a thing.
customer_reviews.author: L. Jaramillo

customer_reviews.title: Came with holes
customer_reviews.text: Fit was great and exactly what my daughter wanted in a costume but came with 3 holes from missed seams I had to sew. There was no time to return. You need better quality control or cheaper prices. I shouldn’t have to sew a $25 new costume.
customer_reviews.author: Erin DK

customer_reviews.title: It’s super cute too
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter for Halloween and she has used it for pajamas ever since! She loves it so much she wears it constantly! It has held up in the wash and lots of use! It’s super cute too :-)
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: it held up fine. I would recommend it to a friend
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her onesie, I will be purchasing another one in purple. For the price the material is adequate and it is well made. I have only washed it once, it held up fine. I would recommend it to a friend. Update: after two more washes it now has a hole in and the fabric is balling up so it does not look as good as it did when we received it.
customer_reviews.author: Jenea

customer_reviews.title: Hood covers face. Not thought through. Otherwise very ...
customer_reviews.text: Hood covers face. Not thought through. Otherwise very cute. Figure out what to do with the hood and you will be ok.
customer_reviews.author: J&M

customer_reviews.title: Perf
customer_reviews.text: Very soft, my daughter LOVES it. Sizing is spot on and the buttons are placed at the correct intervals-no gaping spaces
customer_reviews.author: Nycole

customer_reviews.title: The quality was great and it arrived in just the one day
customer_reviews.text: Completely cute onesie! The fit was right on. My daughter is 4'7" and received the size 10. She still has a little growing room in the legs. The quality was great and it arrived in just the one day. Feel good about the purchase too, since the company donates some of the proceeds.
customer_reviews.author: NCshoegirl

customer_reviews.title: Just reecks of unicorn goodness...
customer_reviews.text: Alittle bd gift for the unicorn in your life! :) Totally worth the money, it's an adorable outfit. It's a gift, so I hope it fits. Just going by what I see, happy w purchase. Have no problem recommending...
customer_reviews.author: DogBreath101

customer_reviews.title: Have y'all ever ordered a onsie?
customer_reviews.text: My daughter LOVES her unicorn onsie. She is a size 8, going on size 10, but not quite there yet. So based on MANY recommendations of how huge this onsie runs, I got her the size 8. Looking at the sleeves and legs, it's short. The body part is large, but that's how a onsie fits. I wish I'd followed my gut instinct and just ordered larger. The order came faster than predicted and the quality is very good. I'm probably going to order it again, but bigger. Too late to return it in time for this year's Halloween costume.
customer_reviews.author: KYLA J SIKORSKI

customer_reviews.title: super cute and cuddly
customer_reviews.text: Adorable! My 8 year old wears it all the time. The size 8 was too big for her and I ended up getting the 5. We'll see how it holds up. She really loves it. ETA: She still wears it ALL the time. Held up fine in the wash. Just use low setting for dryer.
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: Emolly Fashion Kids Animal Unicorn Pajama Onesie
customer_reviews.text: Emolly Fashion Kids Animal Unicorn Pajama Onesie I liked this PJ, but wish it had the zipper in back like the last one I purchased for my daughter had. Made it easier to go to the bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Bought for Halloween and can use year round as pajamas. Holds up well in the washer & dryer and the seams are high quality. This will still be in good condition when it's time to hand it down to younger children.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Hrasky

customer_reviews.title: Very cute Unicorn Onesie, good quality - but has buttons
customer_reviews.text: Good material, well made. I cut a few strangler strings off. I bought as a gift for my niece. I wish it had a zipper rather than buttons. Clearly buttons in the picture, I guess I didn't see that. Snaps would be good too.
customer_reviews.author: H. Halverson

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter LOVES it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 6 year old granddaughter and she LOVES IT! She said it is soft and comfy. She thinks the eyes look friendly and cute! The only thing is it is big on her but, I told her I purchased it that way so she would be able to wear it next year too!!
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my niece!
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a birthday present for my niece. I ordered about a size bigger than what she would normally wear because she is tall and skinny. It fits perfectly, and there’s still room for her when she grows! Looks just as depicted in the pictures. The tail is a little stringy, but it’s cute and comfy!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Love the pjs
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Got it for my niece as a gift to go with her unicorn party theme and was loved by all the guests! Wish there were smaller sizes though for my toddler. The overall quality was just as described!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.cone

customer_reviews.title: Snuggly & fun
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my great niece, didn't know her exact size. This fits great, lots of range, & she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this, only wish they came in bigger sizes cause this is just at her minimum fit. Would have been 5 stars but the stitching on the tail started to come undone after only 2 washes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this onsie! It fits great and is warm and soft.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Tricked!
customer_reviews.text: Not what I asked for. Cheep materials, poor quality! Pretty disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: PVB

customer_reviews.title: Kids will love it!:)
customer_reviews.text: Get it for my 7 years old daughter for pj party at school. She loves it! Wanted wear this right away.The only downside I see is that she was very hot when she went to bed but in the morning she was freezing in it. Next time I will wear thin cotton pants and top before putting this pj on.
customer_reviews.author: Olga

customer_reviews.title: The little boy who wished to be a unicorn loves ...
customer_reviews.text: The little boy who wished to be a unicorn loves these pajamas! He has been wearing them as often as possible for two seasons. Soft, comfy and well made.
customer_reviews.author: duckie15

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: My DD loves it. I bought it a size too big so she can wear it for awhile. It didn’t dissapoint. The colors are great, very little fading after a gentle wash and air dry
customer_reviews.author: 808Aloha

customer_reviews.title: Fits large
customer_reviews.text: Cute design. Two suggestions for improvement are to change the buttons to either snaps or a zipper, easier on little hands and to add feet to complete the coziness.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Fun, but needs help removing
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves wearing this. We bought her a six which was too big. She's normally a 5. It was the only size available though. She loved it either way. The only problem is the buttons. They're a little clunky to use to take off easily.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Super cozy and well made
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to determine the sizing because it is bigger than normal every day clothes your kid would wear but I think they are supposed to be baggy so they can move around in them. My kids were so excited to get them and I love that they donate a portion of the sales to a zoo!
customer_reviews.author: Chowgen

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: It came quicker then expected. It is very nice quality. My only issue is it was bigger than expected however that means my daughter gets to wear it a bit longer.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my little cousin who turned 5. All she told me was that she liked unicorns and barn animals. SHE LOVED THIS! Her mom said she has worn it everyday!! It good quality, feels like a thin fleece. I got a size up so that even if it's a bit big, she can grow into it and have it for longer.
customer_reviews.author: MidwestPanda

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Weirdly long in the crotch, but my daughter loves it. Wears it all day long and to sleep on the weekends. Quality seems good.
customer_reviews.author: BP

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and my daughter loves wearing it. It's held up in the wash and is well made. We received it in a timely manner and in great condition. It does have buttons versus a zipper so make sure your kiddo knows how to work buttons before ordering.
customer_reviews.author: HelloChrissy

customer_reviews.title: I ordered up a size but it runs big so her regular size would have been a better fit.
customer_reviews.text: Just what my 7 year old daughter wanted. I ordered up a size but it runs big so her regular size would have been a better fit.
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: she loved it.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter 9 years old ask for this overall for her birthday gift and while i am writing my feedback about it she is sleeping cozy in it. she loved it ..... it is loose and very comfy
customer_reviews.author: Rima

customer_reviews.title: very cute.
customer_reviews.text: I got it for my 9 years old and she loves it. I washed it several times and still it looks good. originally, I got it for Halloween, but my daughter is wearing it as pajama for pajama day at school too.
customer_reviews.author: Manhastam

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, soft and fits well.
customer_reviews.text: It was a little baggy on my 11 year old, but that is normal as she is on the small side. It worked great for her halloween costume and was super comfy. Zero complaints from her.
customer_reviews.author: CHRISTIAN

customer_reviews.title: Unicorn
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old loves this, was her favorite bday gift
customer_reviews.author: Doug Coveney

customer_reviews.title: Love how cute this is on my daughter
customer_reviews.text: Love how cute this is on my daughter! She loves being a full unicorn tail and all! She sleeps in it, and says how soft the material is. She is 6! Great price for a good quality product! Thanks so much!
customer_reviews.author: Jeni Davidson

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: So cute!! Material is nice! More like a pajama than a costume! Perfect
customer_reviews.author: Kailah

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has been wanting a unicorn on-site for some time now so I ordered this one and she loves it. I accidentally ordered it a little too big but either way she will have it longer. It was easy and fast, I couldn't ask for a better experience.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 10 year old loves it
customer_reviews.text: She has been using as a costume for Halloween and now as Pjs. It is very cozy and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Those People

customer_reviews.title: We bought this for my granddaughter and she absolutely loved it! Not only does she look adorable in ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my granddaughter and she absolutely loved it! Not only does she look adorable in it, but it's warm as well—perfect for cold winter nights.
customer_reviews.author: M. King

customer_reviews.title: Our daughter’s favorite!
customer_reviews.text: Our middle daughter loves the unicorn costume. It is easy to put on and well enough made to serve as pajamas after the Halloween holiday.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Benson

customer_reviews.title: gave this to my neice for her birthday as she ...
customer_reviews.text: gave this to my neice for her birthday as she is addicted to unicorns right now. she loves wearing it & wears it to bed too!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Met expectations on fit and description
customer_reviews.text: Matched description and fit was as expected. Bought for my 10 yr old for Halloween, but became winter pajamas. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: ncsuwufpack

customer_reviews.title: Nice and cozy material
customer_reviews.text: Nice and cozy material. My daughter is going to wear it for a dress up gymnastics meet, as well as Halloween, so I am hoping it holds up well.
customer_reviews.author: Marnie L. Johansen

customer_reviews.title: Darling Onesie
customer_reviews.text: Simply darling. My 4 year-old great niece who loves unicorns was thrilled over this Christmas gift. Nice quality and good fit.
customer_reviews.author: YorkieLover

customer_reviews.title: She loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Daughter is very excited to wear it for Halloween and dress up in general, she wears a size 4 and we ordered a 4, fits great with a little more room to grow. Overall very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Rayanna B.

customer_reviews.title: My niece LOVED getting this for her birthday
customer_reviews.text: My niece LOVED getting this for her birthday! Best gift of the day! Not to mention she taps the horn and it “turns on her unicorn power” :)
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and soft!
customer_reviews.text: My four year old granddaughter was thrilled. Very soft and adorable. I wish they zipped instead of buttons. A bit difficult for her. Don't hesitate to buy!
customer_reviews.author: Loyal Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it 💗
customer_reviews.text: So cute! Soft! Perfect fit! My grandcdaughter loves it! Great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Bertha Roginski

customer_reviews.title: she loved it
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our (obsessed with unicorns) 6 year old The fabric was soft and she absolutely love it. Seller seems to care about the product they sell so I would definitely recommend them to my friends and family and I would buy from them again.
customer_reviews.author: jaime

customer_reviews.title: Quality was good especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this. Quality was good especially for the price

customer_reviews.title: Unicorn Pajama
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it so much that she has not changed into her alternative night gown this week. It's comfortable and roomy.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca N. Kasenge

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loved this.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved this....until she realized she had to button a thousand tiny buttons to get it on. Then she threw it on the floor where it has been ever since!! Why doesn't this have a zipper!!! Ugh!
customer_reviews.author: Cass

customer_reviews.title: Meant for REALLY cold weather! My daughter put it ...
customer_reviews.text: Meant for REALLY cold weather! My daughter put it on and immediately took it off because she got too hot! Very cute though.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wow this animal unicorn item is the best My daughter she love it

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Great pajamas!
customer_reviews.text: Large, but we bought them large to last. These are great and my daughter never wants to take them off!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves it but runs big. Would get a size smaller next time.

customer_reviews.text: The product arrived on time, fitted as expected and had a very happy costumer.

customer_reviews.text: Our granddaughter loves it. Fits a little large, but that's fine.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.text: It came exactly as expected. Since it is summer, ordered it a little big so my little one can grow into it as it gets colder.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic unicorn suit!
customer_reviews.text: I sent this to my niece who is obsessed with unicorns. She won't take it off, I am now Best Auntie, and her parents may never forgive me. Win win!

customer_reviews.title: It’s cute

customer_reviews.title: My 7 year old loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Supper cute and very soft! My 7 year old loved it!

customer_reviews.text: My daughter could not be happier about her Unicorn onesie - which she insisted on wearing to bed. Birthday girl gets her wish on this one 🤣🦄✨

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars

customer_reviews.title: I can barely get my daughter out of this thing ...

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!So Cofmy and cute!👍🏻👍🏻

customer_reviews.title: My son LOVES it!

customer_reviews.title: She was so happy when she opened this

customer_reviews.title: A 3year olds dream

customer_reviews.title: Adorable but runs big.

customer_reviews.title: Great service
customer_reviews.text: Thank you so much. And the service you provide is awesome

customer_reviews.title: It was perfect for a cold Halloween night
customer_reviews.text: It was perfect for a cold Halloween night! My daughter was able to wear her winter coat underneath with no problems. Now that Halloween is over, she loves wearing them as pajamas or just to lounge around the house. She says it is very comfortable.

customer_reviews.title: Baggy but super comfy and warm.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this onesie but it can get too warm for her so she'll sleep without a blanky. It's a baggy fit but She really enjoys it.

customer_reviews.title: Great fit/great quality.
customer_reviews.text: The onesie seems to be made of great material. Very impressed with it.

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Pleased!!
customer_reviews.text: Product was received in excellent quality and packaged perfect!! My daughter loves it!

customer_reviews.title: proving that it's comfortable and fun
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my niece to fulfill her current obsession with unicorns and to keep her warm in the cold NW PA winter. This onesie has one both! She couldn't wait to put it on and kept it on all evening, proving that it's comfortable and fun.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

product_meta.title: Emolly Fashion Kids Animal Unicorn Pajama Onesie - Soft and Comfortable with Pockets
feature_bullets: LOVE IT OR YOUR MONEY BACK - We’re so confident you will love our onesies that we offer a lifetime guarantee! If you don’t love the onesie, or the material doesn’t hold up for any reason, simple contact us for a refund.
KEEPS YOU WARM AND COZY - You can feel the ultra plush material when you wear this onesie so you can be comfortable, warm and cozy while wearing it either to sleep, hang out or at a party!

EASY TO TAKE ON AND OFF - Our one piece unicorn pajama onesie features buttons so that you can put it on and take it off easily. Side pockets make it easy to carry your wallet, keys and cell phone with you.
BREATHABLE POLAR FLEECE MATERIAL - Made from very high quality breathable material so that you can feel comfortable wearing the onesie for hours at a time.

UNISEX - This cool animal onesie is designed for both boys and girls. Easy to clean as well. Made of polyester material can be hand washed and laid flat to dry or washed with cold water, tumble on low heat will keep your onesie looking brand new.
